channel.title: Helping with registering Ip's
channel.description: Hey guy's I just have one thing I need help with wandering if someone here could help me. I would like my server to register people's Ip addresses right now when you log in it says 127.0.0.1 on everyone's clients, and store's each char as this ip. Thanks.

item.title: Helping with registering Ip's
item.dc:creator: @syn_acid syn acid
item.description:
@syn_acid wrote:

Go reset accounts that have more than 100m? No that won’t help sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Helping with registering Ip's
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

I could give you everything needed to create a folder which stores every users IP address in it?
That what you’re looking for?

Read full topic
